name: dzcss
description: devmasterzone CSS & JS utilities packaged for CDN / distribution

scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist && npx postcss css/devmasterzone_all.css -o dist/devmasterzone_all.min.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist && npx rollup -c rollup.config.js && npx terser dist/devmasterzone_alert.js -o dist/devmasterzone_alert.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser dist/devmasterzone_accordion.js -o dist/devmasterzone_accordion.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run version:tag && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD

author: devmasterzone
